title: Go Green! Come see our eco-friendly 2 bedroom at The Park At East Ponce!
posting_body: ['2 Bedroom  2.5 Bathroom | 1354 sq ft | Please call', 'The Park At East Ponce', '1900 Tree Mountain Pkwy', 'Stone Mountain, GA 30083', 'show contact info', 'Description:', "There's plenty of shopping, dining, outdoor activities and more near The Park at East Ponce.", "You'll love living in the Stone Mountain location!", "With a variety of floor plans to choose from, we're certain there's one that's just right for you.", 'Browse our one and two bedroom floor plans.', 'Apartment Amenities:', '✓ Breakfast Bar', '✓ Carpet', '✓ Cozy Fireplaces', '✓ Dishwasher', '✓ Extra Storage', '✓ Island Kitchens', '✓ Patio/Balcony', '✓ Range w/Oven', '✓ Refrigerator', '✓ Sunrooms', '✓ Air Conditioning', '✓ Custom Cabinetry', '✓ Hardwood Flooring', '✓ Individual Climate Control', '✓ Newly Renovated Apartments', '✓ Roommate Floor Plans', '✓ Townhomes Available', '✓ Trash Compactor', '✓ Washer & Dryer Connections', '✓ Window Coverings', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '✓ Activity Court', '✓ Community Events', '✓ Green Community', '✓ Onsite Maintenance', '✓ Planned Community Activities', '✓ Smoke Free', '✓ Storage Space', '✓ Tennis Courts', '✓ Walk to Bus Line', '✓ WI-FI Availability', '✓ Cardio & Fitness Center', '✓ Fax/Copy Services', '✓ On-Site Maintenance', '✓ On-Site Management', '✓ Resident Referral Bonuses', '✓ Resort Style Swimming Pool', '✓ Some Architectural Distinction', '✓ Three Clothes Care Centers', '✓ Trail, Bike, Hike, Jog', '✓ Well Maintained Grounds', 'Additional Details:', 'Deposit: Call', 'Terms: 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month', 'Pets: We welcome your pets for a maximum of 2 pets per apartment home.', 'Pet fee is $300.', '$15 Monthly Pet Fee.', 'Weight limit is 50 lbs.', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Please call our leasing office for more information.', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Admin Fee: $135 - Non-Refundable', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '67DFEC1A07C44FB']
